```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
curry <- read.csv("currycareer.csv")
#filtering and subsetting datasets
curry_2016 <- curry %>%
  filter(Season == 2016)
curry_2015 <- filter(curry, Season == 2015)
curry_2010 <- filter(curry, Season == 2010)
curry_rookie_and_mvp <- curry %>%
  filter(Season %in% c(2010, 2016))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = curry_2016, aes(x = FG., y = PTS)) + geom_point(color = "red") + geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "blue") + labs(x = "Field Goal Percentage", y = "Points", title = "Stephen Curry 2016 FG% vs Points")

ggplot(data = curry_2016, aes(x = Loc, y = PTS)) + geom_violin(color = "black", trim = FALSE) + geom_jitter(color = "blue") + stat_summary(fun = median, geom = "crossbar", color = "red") + labs(x = "Home or Away", y = "Points")
```

```{r}
testplot <- curry %>%
  filter(Season %in% c(2010, 2016)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Loc, y = PTS, fill = Season, colour = Season)) + geom_boxplot(color = "red") + geom_jitter()
testplot
```
